46 struct UserInput {
47  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
50 
51  enum PeripheralType {
52  kUnrecognized = -1,
53  kKey,
54  kMouse
55  };
56 
57  enum ActionType {
58  kNoAction,
59  kPress,
60  kRelease,
61  kScroll,
62  kNUM_ACTION_TYPES
63  };
64 
65  enum TimingType {
66  kNone,
67  kDoubleClick
68  };
69 
71 
72  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
75 
76  UserInput(PeripheralType type);
77  ~UserInput();
78 
80 
81 
84  std::array<ulong, kNUM_ACTION_TYPES> m_timeStamps;
85 
87  ActionType m_actionType = ActionType::kNoAction;
88 
90  TimingType m_timingType = TimingType::kNone;
91 
93  PeripheralType m_inputType;
94 };
95 
100 struct MouseInput : public UserInput {
101  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
104 
106 
107  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
110 
111  MouseInput();
112  ~MouseInput();
113 
115 
116  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
119  friend bool operator==(const MouseInput& lhs, const MouseInput& rhs);
120 
122 
123  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
126 
128  bool isPress() const { return m_actionType == kPress; }
129 
131  bool isRelease() const { return m_actionType == kRelease; }
132 
134  bool isDoubleClick() const { return m_timingType == kDoubleClick; }
135 
137 
138  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
141 
143 
144  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
147 
149  Qt::MouseButton m_mouseButton = Qt::MouseButton::NoButton;
150 
152  Qt::MouseButtons m_activeButtons;
153 
155  Vector2 m_angleDelta;
156 
158 };

164 struct KeyInput: public UserInput {
165  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
168 
170 
171  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
174 
175  KeyInput();
176  ~KeyInput();
177 
179 
180  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
183 
185  QString getKeyString() const { return QKeySequence(m_key).toString(); }
186 
188  bool hasSameKeys(const KeyInput& other) const;
189 
191  bool isPress() const { return m_actionType == kPress; }
192 
194  bool isRelease() const { return m_actionType == kRelease; }
195 
197  bool isDoubleClick() const { return m_timingType == kDoubleClick; }
198 
200 
201  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
204  friend bool operator==(const KeyInput& lhs, const KeyInput& rhs);
205 
207 
208  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
211 
213  Qt::Key m_key = Qt::Key::Key_unknown;
214 
216  Qt::KeyboardModifiers m_modifiers;

219 };
